short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the meaning of a word based on context.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Word Meaning Popup is a lightweight Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience by allowing you to quickly look up the meaning of any word. Simply double-click a word, and a small popup will appear near the selected word with its definition.
